column4: Oh my computer is old. 2002. 1GB. And this happens completely random.
Also, the last time this happened, i was using chronium and I clicked on an icon. that was it.
it could be hardware related on older pc's.  whens the last time it had a good cleaning/dusting out?
Could be. I try with some bottle of compressed air but that was quite some time ago. But this never happened with Jaunty
